summary: This is an email exchange between an Assistant United States Attorney and an unidentified recipient regarding scheduling interviews related to the Epstein investigation. The email mentions two upcoming interviews of inmates.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, is coordinating interview schedules related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Interview
events.description: An interview relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for 12:30 PM.

events.title: Inmate Interview for Epstein Investigation
events.description: Another interview of an inmate relating to the Epstein investigation scheduled for 12:00 PM.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email exchange occurred on September 9-10, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively conducting interviews related to the Epstein investigation.
At least two interviews were scheduled: one on September 10, 2019, and another with an inmate on September 13, 2019.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity by federal prosecutors following Epstein's death.
